text: The Baltimore Ravens finished their season with a tough loss to the Pittsburgh Steelers, falling short in a closely contested game.
The Ravens put up a strong effort, but ultimately came up just short, ending their season with a disappointing defeat.
The Steelers were able to secure the win, with the final score being a testament to the intense rivalry between the two teams.
The Ravens will now head into the offseason, looking to regroup and rebuild for next season, while the Steelers will move on to the next round of the playoffs.
